reviews.text:
The Telefonica building on Diagonal and headquarters of Telefonica in Catalonia. It's an oddly shaped office block that looks a little like a triangular tube, with a facade that looked like Spiderman had used as target practice for his webbing.

Worth a look if in the area, as it's very eye-catching.
A very unique and cool looking building, La Sagrada Familia it’s not but if you are in the area is worth checking out.
we are in the Hotel at the front of that building , it looks amazing architecture , looks very modern .
We passed by the building occasionally since we have to go to the museum next to it. It has a really special outlook.
A very interesting building that is interesting to view from different angles. As well as giving a flat appearance, the ends of the beams at the edges of the building give interest.

This is a lovely and modern building, currently using a communication company.
While we were not able to go up to the roof and take a look at the view, we were allowed in for a quick look and the building looks lovely inside out.
